00001 package newtonERP.viewers.firstStep;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Vector;
00004 
00005 import newtonERP.common.ActionLink;
00006 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.LinkViewer;
00007 import newtonERP.viewers.secondStep.colorViewer.ColorViewer;
00008 import newtonERP.viewers.viewables.FloorViewable;
00009 
00014 public class FloorViewer
00015 {
00016         private static final String noWallColor = "#433";
00017 
00018         private static final String wallColor = "#DEE";
00019 
00020         private static final int internalZoneSize = 72;
00021 
00022         private static final int wallWidth = 4;
00023 
00028         public static String getHtmlCode(FloorViewable entity)
00029         {
00030                 String html = "";
00031 
00032                 html += "<table cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\" cellpadding=\"0\">";
00033 
00034                 int columnCount = entity.getColumnCount();
00035                 for (int y = 0; y < entity.getRowCount(); y++)
00036                 {
00037                         html += "<tr>";
00038                         for (int x = 0; x < columnCount; x++)
00039                         {
00040                                 String currentText = "";
00041                                 String currentColor = "#FFF";
00042 
00043                                 boolean isCorridor = entity.isCorridorAt(x, y);
00044 
00045                                 if (isCorridor)
00046                                 {
00047                                         currentColor = "#000";
00048                                 }
00049                                 else
00050                                 {
00051                                         String zoneName = entity.tryGetZoneNameAt(x, y);
00052 
00053                                         if (zoneName != null)
00054                                         {
00055                                                 currentText = zoneName;
00056                                                 currentColor = ColorViewer.getColor(currentText);
00057                                         }
00058                                 }
00059 
00060                                 html += "<td style=\"width:"
00061                                                 + (internalZoneSize + wallWidth * 2) + "px;height:"
00062                                                 + (internalZoneSize + wallWidth * 2) + "px\">";
00063 
00064                                 html += getRoomHtml(currentText, currentColor, entity, x, y,
00065                                                 isCorridor);
00066 
00067                                 html += "</td>";
00068                         }
00069                         html += "</tr>";
00070                 }
00071                 html += "</table>";
00072 
00073                 return html;
00074         }
00075 
00076         private static String getRoomHtml(String currentText,
00077                         String backgroundColor, FloorViewable entity, int x, int y,
00078                         boolean isCorridor)
00079         {
00080                 String html = "";
00081 
00082                 String northWestColor = noWallColor;
00083                 String northEastColor = noWallColor;
00084                 String southWestColor = noWallColor;
00085                 String southEastColor = noWallColor;
00086                 String eastNorthColor = noWallColor;
00087                 String eastSouthColor = noWallColor;
00088                 String westNorthColor = noWallColor;
00089                 String westSouthColor = noWallColor;
00090 
00091                 if (entity.isWallAt("nord-ouest", x, y))
00092                         northWestColor = wallColor;
00093                 if (entity.isWallAt("nord-est", x, y))
00094                         northEastColor = wallColor;
00095                 if (entity.isWallAt("sud-ouest", x, y))
00096                         southWestColor = wallColor;
00097                 if (entity.isWallAt("sud-est", x, y))
00098                         southEastColor = wallColor;
00099                 if (entity.isWallAt("ouest-nord", x, y))
00100                         westNorthColor = wallColor;
00101                 if (entity.isWallAt("est-nord", x, y))
00102                         eastNorthColor = wallColor;
00103                 if (entity.isWallAt("ouest-sud", x, y))
00104                         westSouthColor = wallColor;
00105                 if (entity.isWallAt("est-sud", x, y))
00106                         eastSouthColor = wallColor;
00107 
00108                 html += "<table style=\"width:100%;height:100%\" cellpadding=\"0\" cellspacing=\"0\" border=\"0\">";
00109 
00110                 html += "<tr>";
00111 
00112                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;width:" + wallWidth
00113                                 + "px;background-color:" + noWallColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00114                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;background-color:"
00115                                 + northWestColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00116                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;background-color:"
00117                                 + northEastColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00118                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;width:" + wallWidth
00119                                 + "px;background-color:" + noWallColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00120 
00121                 html += "</tr>";
00122 
00123                 html += "<tr>";
00124 
00125                 html += "<td style=\"height:32px;width:" + wallWidth
00126                                 + "px;background-color:" + westNorthColor
00127                                 + "\"><div></div></td>";
00128                 html += "<td colspan=\"2\" rowspan=\"2\" ><div style=\"width:"
00129                                 + internalZoneSize + "px;height:" + internalZoneSize
00130                                 + "px;overflow:auto;background-color:" + backgroundColor
00131                                 + "\">";
00132                 html += currentText;
00133 
00134                 Vector<ActionLink> actionLinkList = entity.getActionLinkListAt(x, y);
00135 
00136                 if (!isCorridor)
00137                         for (ActionLink link : actionLinkList)
00138                         {
00139                                 String currentLinkCode = LinkViewer.getHtmlCode(link);
00140                                 if (currentLinkCode.length() > 0)
00141                                         html += currentLinkCode;
00142                         }
00143 
00144                 html += "</div></td>";
00145                 html += "<td style=\"height:32px;width:" + wallWidth
00146                                 + "px;background-color:" + eastNorthColor
00147                                 + "\"><div></div></td>";
00148 
00149                 html += "</tr>";
00150 
00151                 html += "<tr>";
00152 
00153                 html += "<td style=\"height:32px;width:" + wallWidth
00154                                 + "px;background-color:" + westSouthColor
00155                                 + "\"><div style=\"height:32px;width:" + wallWidth
00156                                 + "px\"></div></td>";
00157                 html += "<td style=\"height:32px;width:" + wallWidth
00158                                 + "px;background-color:" + eastSouthColor
00159                                 + "\"><div style=\"height:32px;width:" + wallWidth
00160                                 + "px\"></div></td>";
00161 
00162                 html += "</tr>";
00163 
00164                 html += "<tr>";
00165 
00166                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;width:" + wallWidth
00167                                 + "px;background-color:" + noWallColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00168                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;background-color:"
00169                                 + southWestColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00170                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;background-color:"
00171                                 + southEastColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00172                 html += "<td style=\"height:" + wallWidth + "px;width:" + wallWidth
00173                                 + "px;background-color:" + noWallColor + "\"><div></div></td>";
00174 
00175                 html += "</tr>";
00176 
00177                 html += "</table>";
00178 
00179                 return html;
00180         }
00181 }
